sn_aia_usecase.base_plan: Step 1 - ask the user for the FSo cas number. collect all the information for the submission like propensity to bind, number of locations under the submission, number of buildings under each location from the FSO case table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_fso_uw_case) and its related lists. Step 2 - Collect information for each location like address from the cat perils table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_location_cat_perils) by finding the associated FSO underwriting case. Step 3 - Collect information for each building like address from the structure table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_structure_information) by finding the associated underwriting case record and associated locations for each building. Step 4 - collect coverage details from coverages table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_underwriting_coverage) and categorize then by attachment (policy level, location level and building level)
sn_aia_usecase.description: use case for FSO UW submission summarization
sn_aia_usecase.name: FSO UW.AI

sys_update_version.name: sn_aia_usecase_ded7f69d93e8a2d08b8674121bba10ca
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>Step 1 - ask the user for the FSo cas number. collect all the information for the submission like propensity to bind, number of locations under the submission, number of buildings under each location from the FSO case table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_fso_uw_case) and its related lists. Step 2 - Collect information for each location like address from the cat perils table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_location_cat_perils) by finding the associated FSO underwriting case. Step 3 - Collect information for each building like address from the structure table (x_ltin2_uw_ai_structure_information) by finding the associated underwriting case record and associated locations for each building.
